# update()

**Instance Method**

Updates the underlying value of the stored value.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func update()
```

## Discussion

SwiftUI calls this function before rendering a view’s [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/body-8kl5o] to ensure the view has the most recent value.
title: update()
